oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Broadway Song Shop - 46
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: WSM program Broadway Song Shop, with announcer Louie Buck and performances by Mary Dugan with an orchestra (likely the WSM staff orchestra, unconfirmed). Circa early 1940s.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Mary Dugan
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: [Unidentified radio excerpt, test band] -- Theme (I'm In A Happy Frame Of Mind) -- Opening statement (Louie Buck) -- Gaucho Serenade (Mary Dugan, organ) -- Louie Buck talks -- Why Begin Again (orchestra) -- Louie Buck talks -- What's The Matter With Me (Mary Dugan, orchestra) -- Louie Buck talks -- I've Got You Under My Skin (orchestra) -- Louie Buck talks -- I Don't Stand A Ghost Of A Chance With You (Mary Dugan, orchestra) -- Theme (I'm In A Happy Frame Of Mind) -- Closing statement (Louie Buck, Mary Dugan)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Broadway song shop (Radio program); Buck, Louis, 1910-1971; Dugan, Mary (Vocalist)
